en./help: list of commands available to the user
en./ankete: questionnaire about the quality of service

close_menu.en: To open the menu, enter the command: /start

catalog_p4_v2.en: Currently out of stock. We apologize.

delivery_p1_v1.en: Specify the date of delivery of the goods in the format dd.mm.yyyy

delivery_p2_v1.en: Specify the delivery time in hh:mm format

delivery_p3_v1.en: Enter the recipient's name (With a capital letter, not any numbers):

ankete_number_questions.ru: Просим Вас в свободной форме ответить на два вопроса:
ankete_number_questions.en: We ask you to answer two questions in a free form:

ankete_q1.ru: Опишите что Вам НЕ понравилось в нашем Магазине:
ankete_q1.en: Describe what you didn't like in our Store:

ankete_q2.ru: Опишите что Вам понравилось в нашем Магазине:
ankete_q2.en: Describe what you liked in our Store:
